author: Reuters Editorial
description: German prosecutors, who searched Daimler's offices this week as part of an investigation into diesel pollution, are talking to U.S. authorities, the Stuttgart public prosecutor's office said on Wednesday.
title: German prosecutor says is in touch with U.S. authorities on Daimler

author: Kartikay Mehrotra, Ryan Beene
description: General Motors Co. was accused of putting defeat devices in its trucks to beat emissions tests,Â the sixth carmaker linked to diesel cheating scandal since 2015, when Volkswagen AG admitted to installing software to bypass pollution rules.
title: GM Accused in Lawsuit of Using VW-Like Defeat Devices
